value:
Oh, Huey! You're the best pegasus
a girl could ever hope for. H-hey,
stop it. That tickles!

I'm one of three sisters. I'm...
well...I'm the youngest one. I guess
someone always has to be!

I just don't have the words to thank
you for all you do, but... Um, well...?$k$pThank you, I guess.

Truth is, I get a little shy around
men. Even friends. And, well?
Way more than a little.

I say sorry a lot, and I know that
can get on people's nerves.
So, uh...sorry?

I was asked... That is, it was
$Nf who...$k$pWait—where was I? Oh, yes! I was
asked to come say hello!
Growing this much? Incredible!

I've gotten stronger, so I can help
more!

Aw. Now my sisters are going to
laugh at me.

Thanks so much! I'll try to do my
best for you!

My name is—! Sorry, let me start again.
Come on, deep breath, Florina...
My name is Florina! Hi there!

Could you maybe give me
a moment of your time?$k$pSorry to bother you, but there's
something I...I have to say.$k$pYou know how hard I find it
to put things into words.
But I'm...$k$pI'm really happy to have fought
under your guidance! I've gotten
more capable in battle!$k$pSo I just wanted to thank you
from the bottom of my heart.$k$pHee hee! I hope that made it
clear how much I want to
keep fighting for you!
え、えいっ！
や、やぁっ！
きゃああっ！
ふぇぇっ…
Pardon me!
Uh, sorry!
Take that!
Whoaaaa!
Sorry...
Huhu
So, I think...? You know? Well, of course YOU do.
I'm a bit, hmm, skittish? So don't do anything TOO sudden, OK?
I'm...? I don't know. There's no good word. Shy?
I'm still in training, so sorry if I...? Ugh. Just a big sorry.
I try to do the best I can at everything.
I need to complete my training so I can stand on my own—as soon as I can!
I'm so...thankful...that I can work for you.
Yes?
Umm?
What next?
